Method.doc:
Logs a message to the log file and Hammerspoon console

Parameters:
 * message - String to log
Method.name: log

Method.doc:
Checks if the current user has admin privileges

Returns:
 * true if user is admin, false otherwise
Method.name: checkAdminStatus
returns: * true if user is admin, false otherwise

Method.doc:
Checks if current time is within business hours (weekday 7am-5pm)

Returns:
 * true if within business hours, false otherwise
Method.name: isBusinessHours
returns: * true if within business hours, false otherwise

Method.doc:
Shows a confirmation dialog asking user to elevate privileges

Returns:
 * true if user confirmed, false if cancelled
Method.name: showConfirmationDialog
returns: * true if user confirmed, false if cancelled

Method.doc:
Clicks the 'Request Admin Privileges' menu item in Jamf Connect

Returns:
 * true if successful, false otherwise
Method.name: clickMenubarItem

Method.doc: Main function that checks admin status and prompts for elevation if needed
Method.name: checkAndElevate

Method.doc:
Starts the periodic check timer

Returns:
 * The JamfElevate object
Method.name: start

Method.doc:
Stops the periodic check timer

Returns:
 * The JamfElevate object
Method.name: stop

Method.doc: Manually trigger an elevation check (bypasses business hours check)
Method.name: manualCheck
bindHotkeys
parameters: * mapping - A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following items:
* manualCheck - Manually trigger an elevation check

desc: Automatically prompts to request admin privileges via Jamf Connect during business hours
doc:
Automatically prompts to request admin privileges via Jamf Connect during business hours

Download: [https://github.com/yourusername/JamfElevate.spoon](https://github.com/yourusername/JamfElevate.spoon)
